description: This file defines a mock class L0ServiceMock used for testing plugin services in the L0 namespace. It provides methods to register, unregister, and query interface instances based on callsign and interface ID. The class maintains a registry mapping callsigns and interface IDs to interface implementations, enabling fake responses for tests.

classes.name: L0ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock class for plugin host services, allowing registration and lookup of interface instances based on callsign and interface ID for testing purposes.

methods.name: void RegisterInterface(const std::string & callsign,const uint32_t interfaceId,WPEFramework::Core::IUnknown * instance)
methods.description: Registers an interface instance under a given callsign and interface ID. Does not take ownership of the instance.

methods.name: void UnregisterInterface(const std::string & callsign,const uint32_t interfaceId)
methods.description: Unregisters the interface instance associated with the callsign and interface ID, removing it from the registry.

methods.name: WPEFramework::Core::IUnknown * QueryInterfaceByCallsign(const std::string & callsign,const uint32_t interfaceId) const
methods.description: Returns the registered interface instance for the specified callsign and interface ID, or nullptr if not found.

ctags.name: QueryInterfaceByCallsign
ctags.pattern: /^    WPEFramework::Core::IUnknown* QueryInterfaceByCallsign(const std::string& callsign, const ui/

ctags.name: RegisterInterface
ctags.pattern: /^    void RegisterInterface(const std::string& callsign, const uint32_t interfaceId, WPEFramework/

ctags.name: UnregisterInterface
ctags.pattern: /^    void UnregisterInterface(const std::string& callsign, const uint32_t interfaceId)$/
